entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except 14 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5 except 14 inland. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
